message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value. However,  $14,000 is my bottom line to make this worthwhile. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13,500. I think that's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
